text: um reflecting on the session today and
looking back at what we've achieved so
far in South Africa and where we are
going um I think integrated reporting is
no longer an negotiable
for companies in the world um as in
South Africa it's mandatory now we've
been on that journey and I think um it
is important to realize that it is a
journey that you embark on when you
engage with sustainability reporting and
leading into integrated reporting
there's no onesizefitit all answer to it
um you need to do what is best for the
environment in which you
function the industry in which you
function um the category also the
culture of the company the culture of
the countries that you function in etc
looking back at at where we came from it
was really a journey we started 15 years
ago and we are not there yet we evolve
every year we look what works and where
we need to improve and I think that is
very important
um embarking on sustainability reporting
and integrated reporting to realize that
it is really a journey that that you are
in terms
of companies starting with it the
question where to start what I can
encourage companies to do is to just
start somewhere don't wait for an
international standard it um don't wait
for your country or your government to
regulate it start because it's the right
thing to do start with what you have in
mind the data that you've got and start
communicating on that make sure that
you've got systems in place that can
capture the data that is reliable
trustworthy and use that um to
communicate to your stakeholders
important is to identify your
stakeholders engage with them and
understand what they want to know about
your company very important is to link
the
strategy to the integrated performance
of your company and where you are going
in South Africa we've started with a
group um the working group that links
into the international
um
integrated reporting working group and I
think that links back to the quest for
ambassadorship raised this morning that
those companies who are doing well
should act as ambassadors and help other
companies to embark on this journey and
really to help them to understand what
it is guide them with knowledge wherever
they go
